casebody.data:
BANK
v.
BEST & BEST. No. 494PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Richard S. Daniels, Asheville, for Best and Best. John J. Korzen, for Blue Ridge Bank.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of January 2006 by Plaintiff and Defendant to Withdraw Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
